'''Combat Talents''' are [[Talents]] that are used through inputs. These include: [[Normal Attack]]s, [[Elemental Skill]]s, [[Elemental Burst]]s, and, for some characters, [[Alternate Sprint]]s.

With the exception of Alternate Sprints, these Talents can be upgraded using [[Character Talent Material]]s.
